title: 1/8 Acre Plots – Matuu Bypass
description: Prime serviced 1/8 acre plots located just off the Matuu Bypass. Red soil, ready to build, well-developed area with water and electricity nearby. Perfect for residential or investment purposes.

title: 50×100 Plots – Juja Farm
description: Fast-growing neighborhood with excellent appreciation. Ideal for rental units, family homes, or land banking. Accessible through newly tarmacked roads.

title: 1/8 Acre Plots – Konza Techno City Area
description: Affordable plots strategically located near Kenya’s fast-developing smart city. Excellent for speculation and long-term investment. Electricity close by.
